roleset.name: remove armed forces, removal of military presence

example.name: the one example
example.text: We don't expect much good from nuclear-arms control, but conventional-arms talks might demilitarize Eastern Europe.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: Kayani twice called for demilitarization of troops from the world's highest battle ground.
example.arg: from the world's highest battle ground

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: All chemical depots recommended for closure under BRAC 2005 are scheduled to complete their demilitarization of chemical weapons before 2011...

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: Prussia as a state was dissolved by the Allies in 1945 as part of their demilitarization of Germany.

roleset.note: DEMILITARIZE-V NOTES: Arg numbering based on remove. (from demilitarize.01-v)
DEMILITARIZATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, demilitarize.01. No corresponding VNcls. (from demilitarization.01-n)
